alert.note: Alert for Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CLINCH COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Du Pont, or 7 miles northwest of Homerville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Argyle, Du Pont, and Cogdell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
